statements: UPDATE phishing_domains SET domain_name = 'example.com', is_malicious = 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE phishing_domains SET last_accessed = '2022-08-15 07:30:00', domain_name = 'malicious.com' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE phishing_domains SET domain_name = 'example.com', last_accessed = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', is_malicious = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE phishing_domains SET creation_date = '2022-01-20', domain_name = 'malicious-domain.com', last_accessed = '2022-01-25 08:45:00', is_malicious = false WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE phishing_domains SET country = 'USA' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE phishing_reports SET report_status = 'Reviewed', report_date = '2022-09-13' WHERE domain_id = 2;
UPDATE phishing_domains SET country='United States' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE phishing_reports SET report_status='Resolved', report_date='2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE domain_id=2;
UPDATE phishing_domains SET is_active = TRUE WHERE domain_id = 1;
UPDATE phishing_checks SET check_result = 'Safe', check_description = 'No issues found.' WHERE domain_id = 2;
UPDATE phishing_domains SET registration_date='2022-01-15', is_active=FALSE WHERE domain_name='example.com';
UPDATE phishing_reports SET reporter_name='John Doe', report_reason='Phishing attempt detected' WHERE report_id=1;
UPDATE phishing_domains SET status='inactive' WHERE domain_id = '3f7aa653-49d2-4bc9-bc58-b74f9225f617';
UPDATE domain_blacklist SET reason='Suspicious activity' WHERE domain_id = '3f7aa653-49d2-4bc9-bc58-b74f9225f617';
UPDATE phishing_domains SET status='blocked' WHERE domain_name='example.com';
UPDATE phishing_attempts SET success=TRUE, timestamp=NOW() WHERE domain_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE phishing_domains SET status = 'suspended' WHERE domain_name = 'example.com';
UPDATE phishing_victims SET phone_number = '+11234567890' WHERE victim_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE phishing_domains SET status = 'suspended', registrar = 'GoDaddy' WHERE id = 12345;
UPDATE phishing_reports SET reporter_name = 'John Doe', status = 'resolved', description = 'Resolved the issue' WHERE report_id = 'RPT123';
